text.autoconfig.wikiwriter.title: WikiWriter Config
text.autoconfig.wikiwriter.option.modEna: Enabled the features of this mod.
text.autoconfig.wikiwriter.option.copyin: Toggle whether or not individually-copied items will have their amounts set to 1
Disables the ability to click on items in menus that don't have an item ID or name. (Items without a name and any lore already cannot be clicked nor hovered over. This doesn't change that.)

Toggles when copied items in menus should use template references instead (i.e. {{Item_diamond_sword}}) 

This setting doesn't affect recipes or items without a SkyBlock ID.
Automatically converts copied shop GUIs to use the required shop menu format.\n\nNote: Shop prices are affected by certain accessories, so make sure to remove them first.
text.autoconfig.wikiwriter.option.textFi: Text Filters
Remove Dungeon Stats
When enabled, dungeon stats in dark gray text will be removed from item lore.
Remove Text Below Item Rarities in Items
When enabled, text below item rarities will be removed from lore.
Remove Text Below Item Rarities in Menus
When enabled, text below item rarities will be removed from lore.
Lore Filters
Remove Right Click Notices
When enabled, specific text lines that reference the act of clicking will be stripped from lore.
Remove Shop Price
When enabled, text that mentions the prices and requirements of purchasing items will be removed from lore.
Remove Shop Stock Price
When enabled, text that mentions clicking to purchase items will be removed from lore.
Remove Shop Buy Text
When enabled, text that mentions clicking to purchase items will be removed from lore.
Remove Pickaxe Abilities
When enabled, pickaxe abilities will be removed from lore.
Remove Pet Items
When enabled, pet items will be removed from lore.
